advices.parameters: Select and weight the desired parameter(s) from 1 to 5 to find the right place for you
advices.marker: Drop a marker and find out the walking distance (5, 10 and 15 minutes)
advices.details: Use the mouse and click on the zone if you want to have more information

price.title: Price
price.help: The "price" option is based on the average selling price in the zone. You can move the slider to adjust the price you want.

age.title: Age
age.help: The "age" option is based on the age distribution in the zone. You can select age ranges and move the slider to adjust the percentage of the selected ranges.

neighborhood.title: Neighborhood
neighborhood.help: The "neighborhood" option is based on the satisfaction of the people in the zone.

culture.title: Culture
culture.help: Is there good access to culture in the neighborhood?

outdoor.title: Outdoor
outdoor.help: Is nature easily accessible? Is there enough outdoor space?

transport.title: Transport
transport.help: Is there good access to public transport?

walkway.title: Walkway
walkway.help: Are there enough sidewalks and bike paths?

grocery.title: Grocery
grocery.help: Is there enough access to grocery stores

confFileError.title: Configuration file error
confFileError.message: It seems that a configuration file was not loaded correctly.
confFileError.advice: You can try reloading the page!

serverError.title: Server error
serverError.message: It seems that there is a problem on the server, if the problem persists, contact us!
